W

Weapon - Class in Battle.Unit
This class is used to create weapons and to manage their properties.
Weapon(String, int, FightAirship) - Constructor for class Battle.Unit.Weapon
Creates a new instance of a weapon depending on its name and level.
WeaponActionCard - Class in Battle.GeneralBattle
This class regroups the properties and methods of action cards used by weapons.
WeaponActionCard(Element, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Battle.GeneralBattle.WeaponActionCard
Creates a new instance of action card and load its properties.
weaponAttack(FightAirship, WeaponActionCard) - Method in class Battle.Unit.Weapon
Attacks the target airship.
weaponBuff(WeaponActionCard) - Method in class Battle.Unit.Weapon
Adds buffs to the weapon for the next attack.
weaponButton - Variable in class Battle.Unit.Weapon
Button of the weapon.
weaponButtonList - Variable in class Battle.GeneralBattle.FightAirship
List of the buttons of every buttons on this airship.
weaponPane - Variable in class Battle.GeneralBattle.FightAirship
GridPane including the buttons of each weapon on this airship.
weaponsList - Variable in class Battle.GeneralBattle.FightAirship
List of weapons on this ship.
weaponsList - Variable in class Management.GeneralManagement.Airship
List of the weapons build on the ship.
weaponToggleGroup - Variable in class Battle.GeneralBattle.BombingCombatManager
Toggle group of the buttons representing the weapons.
width - Variable in class Management.GeneralManagement.AnimatedThing
Width of a sprite.
